Package com.example.movie_theatre.repository

Interface MovieRepo

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Movie,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Movie,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Movie,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Movie,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Movie,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Movie>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Movie,Integer>
public interface MovieRepo extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Movie,Integer>
Repository interface for performing CRUD operations on Movie entities. This interface extends JpaRepository, which provides basic persistence methods.

  • Method Details

    • findByMovieTitleContainingIgnoreCase

      List<Movie> findByMovieTitleContainingIgnoreCase(String keyword, org.springframework.data.domain.Sort sort)
      Finds movies whose titles contain the specified keyword (case-insensitive). The results are sorted based on the specified Sort object.
      Parameters:
      keyword - the keyword to search for in movie titles
      sort - the sorting criteria for the result list
      Returns:
      a list of movies that match the search criteria
